tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PeerReviewData (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewer_id INT NOT NULL,
  paper_id INT NOT NULL,
  review_date DATE,
  decision VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE peer_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  submission_id UUID,
  review_date TIMESTAMP,
  decision VARCHAR(50),
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE submissions (
  submission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_date TIMESTAMP,
  author_id UUID,
  title VARCHAR(100),
  abstract TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id UUID,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  review_date DATE,
  decision VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE submissions (
  submission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  author_id UUID,
  submission_date DATE,
  title VARCHAR,
  abstract TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE decisions (
  decision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  review_id UUID,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  decision_date DATE,
  final_decision VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS review_decisions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_id UUID,
    submission_id UUID,
    decision TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS reviews (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_id UUID,
    submission_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    reviewed_paper VARCHAR(100),
    review_date DATE,
    decision VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE reviewers (
    reviewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE papers (
    paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    abstract TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision VARCHAR(20),
    review_id INT REFERENCES reviews(review_id)
)

CREATE TABLE benchmarking_data (
    benchmark_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id INT REFERENCES reviews(review_id),
    benchmark_score FLOAT,
    benchmark_date DATE
)
